Trirutda.name: Trirutda Nawattranakul
Trirutda.about: My name is Trirutda Nawattranakul, a coordinator Assistant and an experienced chef. After getting both culinary certificate and administrative assistant certificate from Vancouver Community College, I have been developing my knowledge on Office tools and data analysis. I am currently looking for a full-time administrator assistant.

experience.name: Administrative Assistant
responsibilities: Used computer spreadsheet and database software to prepare forms and documents.
Prepared and sent outgoing mails and scanned paper documents to keep on files.
Provided secretarial and administrative support to management and other staff

experience.name: Sale Associate
experience.description: This is like an accountant job which is cool and i am cool.
responsibilities: Resolved customer concerns by rectifying product and service problems.
Determined the cause of the problems; selected and explained the best solutions to solve the problems; expedited correction or adjustment; followed up to ensure satisfactory resolution.

educations.name: Customer Service and Cashier Training Certificate
Adult Graduation Diploma

volunteer.name: Teaching Assistant for ESL Conversation Program
responsibilities: Led small groups of adults to support them in improving their English conversation skills.

computer: Proficient with Microsoft Office 2010:  Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, and Outlook
